desc: Located in the beautiful artist colony of Laguna Beach, California, we feature Clothing, Accessories, Jewelry, Health & Beauty products, Candles & Essential Oils and more at very affordable prices. Join our family of happy customers today!

layout.text: The Story Behind Laguna Clothing Company
Founded in 2008 in the beautiful artist colony of Laguna Beach, California, we proudly feature thousands of quality items at great values with FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!
